Local and Travel Information

Driving Directions to the Sheraton Tucson Hotel

From Tucson International Airport to the Sheraton Tucson Hotel

Exit the airport heading north on Tucson Boulevard and turn right on Valencia. Take Valencia to Palo Verde and turn left. Stay on Palo Verde for approximately 6 miles (the name eventually changes to Alvernon). Turn right on Grant and proceed approximately 1 1/2 miles. The hotel is on the left at 5151 East Grant.

From Phoenix International Airport to the Sheraton Tucson Hotel

Take Interstate 10 East towards Tucson and exit on Grant Road going east. Take Grant for approximately 6 miles (past Swan Road). The hotel is on the left at 5151 East Grant.

From other points to the Sheraton Tucson Hotel

See the Sheraton web site for other directions and a map.
